notes: base form; irregular passato remoto stem 'sep-'
example_sentence_english: I want to know the truth.
Knowing this, I will act differently.
I found out about it yesterday.
Do you know how to drive?

example_sentence_italian: Io seppi la verità solo dopo.
example_sentence_english: I learned the truth only later.

notes: also used as formal 'Lei'; passato remoto irregular root 'sep-'
example_sentence_italian: Seppe la verità e non parlò.
example_sentence_english: He knew the truth and did not speak.

example_sentence_italian: Noi sapemmo la verità troppo tardi.
example_sentence_english: We learned the truth too late.

example_sentence_italian: Voi sapeste la risposta prima di me.
example_sentence_english: You (plural) knew the answer before me.
They found out about the party late.

notes: used with auxiliary avere; past participle 'saputo'
example_sentence_english: I found out the news yesterday.

notes: used with auxiliary avere; past participle 'saputo'
example_sentence_english: Have you heard about the meeting?

translation_english: he has known/she has known/you (formal) have known
notes: used with auxiliary avere; also used as formal 'Lei'
example_sentence_english: He has found out the truth.

notes: used with auxiliary avere; past participle 'saputo'
example_sentence_italian: Abbiamo saputo quello che è successo.
example_sentence_english: We have found out what happened.

notes: used with auxiliary avere; past participle 'saputo'
used with auxiliary avere; past participle 'saputo'
example_sentence_english: They found out everything from the press.
